data.message: "What ever you like" Coming to America. It's me Stan, no he's dead it's me Slim Shady Jr...I wanna be a star cause I'm scar'd/ which makes my music hard/ baring these verses on beats where they should be barred/ some of these rappers should be barred/ cause they aren't making art/ they scribble scrabble/ and babble about the same shit/ and with me it sort of hit or miss/ Obama leaving office that's evident/ but a nigga like me will need a little more evidence/ he still has a legacy/ to maintain with more life in his blood veins/ two terms and he's set for life/ I am a loyal fan/ cause I understand hard questions when people demands answers/ I can't blame one man/ when he comes with many/ intelligent beings
